text: Pierpaolo Barbieri (Born, May 17, 1987) is an Argentine economic historian, researcher, Executive Director at Greenmantle, founder of the personal finance application Ualá, He is also the author of the book La Sombra de Hitler. Barbieri is also an economic analyst and has published articles in newspapers and magazines such as the Spanish newspaper El País, where he writes regularly, Foreign Affairs, The New York Times, The Financial Times, The Wall Street Journal, CNN, The New Republic, Weekly Standard and the Argentinian newspapers Perfil, Clarín and La Nación. ==References== Category:1987 births Category:Living people Category:People from Buenos Aires Category:Harvard University alumni
